project_descr: Support to development of transitional justice mechanism, aligned with international standards and strengthen the criminal justice system to ensure that the system has the capacity to address conflict-related legal challenges facing Nepal.

outputs.output_descr: Supporting holistic and victim centered transitional justice process in Nepal that adequately addressed conflict related violations of human rights and international humanitarian law and victims' post conflict needs
donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME
UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
